name: Small Thing
description: Small Thing develops intelligent marine robots capable of autonomous navigation, detection, and microplastic collection. Each robot is part of a self-learning swarm, sharing mission data through an encrypted AI mesh network. Designed for real-world conditions — salt, pressure, waves — they operate without pilots, adapting their behavior through onboard edge AI. All collected data is aggregated into a real-time ocean intelligence platform, bridging robotics, data science, and environmental restoration.
